    • tryPurchase

      public void tryPurchase(UpgradeTileModel tileClickedOn)
      This should attempt to purchase an upgrade tile from the shop. Verifies the player has sufficient funds, deducts the cost, removes the item from the shop, and logs the transaction.
      Parameters:
      tileClickedOn - the upgrade tile the player is trying to purchase
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if tileClickedOn is empty (null)
      See Also:
      • for adding to player's collection
